entry.title: Maar Rthw
entry.content:
Rainbow technologies to heal war.

War march transformed with artificial intelligence systems that learned from scientific and poetic texts.

  • Artwork: Maar

Download

Thanks for purchasing this composition, hope you enjoy it.

entry.title: Maar Skysounds.1
entry.content:
Skylight.1

Soundscapes from the north of Maar World, recorded when groundwater comes into contact with magma.

  • Master: I/O Studios by Nicolas Panzl and Diego Rey, Montevideo Uruguay.
  • Artwork: vrglitch + Maar

Download

Thanks for purchasing this composition, hope you enjoy it.

entry.title: Maar Spherical Drops
entry.content:
Spherical Drops

Timeless and Spaceless mix from planet Earth, remixing Chopin experiences in Valdemosa, frogs singing in Valizas, jungle recordings in Costa Rica.

  • Artwork: Maar

Download

Thanks for purchasing this composition, hope you enjoy it.

entry.title: Maar Revx000
entry.content:
Revolution X

Aural improvisation that fuses electronic and acoustic instruments from Africa, America, Asia, Europe, and Oceania.

  • Artwork: Maar

Download

Thanks for purchasing this composition, hope you enjoy it.
